original_text: You shall not uncover the nakedness of your father's brother, that is, you shall not approach his wife; she is your aunt.
korean_text: 너는 네 아버지 형제의 아내를 가까이 하여 그의 하체를 범하지 말라 그는 네 숙모니라

sentences.original_text: You shall not uncover the nakedness of your father's brother
you shall not approach his wife
